title: Phase 5 Checkpoint: Audio
description: Checkpoint schema for Phase 5 (Audio) containing audio mixing and normalization settings

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when checkpoint was created

input_video_path.description: Absolute path to source video file

phase_duration_seconds.description: Time taken to complete this phase in seconds

normalize_audio.description: Whether to normalize audio levels across segments (FR-020)

normalization_target_db.description: Target loudness in dB (typically -16.0 for EBU R128 standard)

background_music_file.description: Path to background music file or null if no music (FR-021)

background_music_volume.description: Music volume relative to original audio (0.0-1.0, where 1.0 is same level)

fade_music_at_speech.description: Whether to automatically reduce music volume during speech/high audio activity (FR-022)
